name: simple_agent_maps_grounded
description: AI assistant that grounds answers using Google Maps search and always cites sources
useCases: Find nearby restaurants and services for personal errands
Scout locations for client meetings and company events
Research office locations when expanding to new cities
Find vendors and service providers near your business locations
samplePrompts: Find all Starbucks locations within a 2-mile radius of Union Square in San Francisco. Show me their hours, ratings, and which ones have drive-thru.
Search for event venues in downtown Seattle that can accommodate 100+ people, have parking, and are rated 4.5 stars or higher.
Find the nearest urgent care clinics to 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA. Show me their current wait times and which ones accept walk-ins.
Search for coworking spaces in Austin's Domain area with 24/7 access, meeting rooms, and proximity to public transit stops.
author: Albert Folch
